definitions.title: Pe.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. of beasts [[תְּדוּר]] Da 4:18; 3 mpl. birds [[יְדֻרוּן]] v:Da 4:9 (Qr f. [[יְדוּרָן]], f. subj., [[חִפֲּרֵי]], follows, cf. v:Da 4:18 and K:§ 98, 2 c, Anm. 3); Pt. pl. of men, [[דָּאדִין]] Kt Da 2:38, Da 3:31, Da 6:26 (Qr [[דָּֽיְרִין]]); as subst., cstr. [[דָּארֵי]] Kt Da 4:32, Da 4:32 (Qr [[דָּֽיְרֵי]]) as subst., cstr. [[דָּארֵי]] Kt Da 4:32, Da 4:32 (Qr [[דָּֽיְרֵי]] dwellers.
